name: South Bay Synergy/Strava Discord Integration
title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Built a Discord bot to track Strava activities and statistics for South Bay Synergy, a dragon boat club of 30+ members. Deployed a website for users to view Strava activities, leaderboards, and profiles; deployed a backend to integrate with Strava API.

name: Wordie
summary: Developed a web game where players guess the daily randomly generated six letter word. Integrated the Merriam-Webster dictionary API to store six-letter words and validate guessed words.

name: MotivateMe
summary: Collaborated with a team of 4 to build a cross platform mobile application that would motivate users to complete their goals by taking photos of their progress and highlight their accomplishments. Organized the UI/UX design of the mobile app, developing prototypes and getting user feedback. Worked on major features like authentication, goal setting, and weekly goal summary.
